column2: 2947}}-?) was the sister of [[Finduilas (wife of Denethor)
column3: Finduilas]] and [[Imrahil]] of [[Dol Amroth]]. She was the firstborn child of [[Adrahil II]].<ref>{{PM
column4: Elendil}}, ''The Line of Dol Amroth'', p. 221</ref>
